title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21004 0 - 0 - 3: 2 Credits Laboratory experiments related to above topics.

title: Concepts taught in class
text: Application of theory taught so far in the courses related to structures courses of all semester starting from first year. Gives you an hands on experience of how theory works with practical setup.

title: Student Opinion
text: With setup we have, it's good enough to practical experience of how the equations really works. As far as the industry is concerned just search up in the internet of individual setup when the Lab sessions will start you will get to know some setup such as UTM and Torsion experiment are actually used.

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Be regular with the lab and its related theory session because questions asked in the paper and viva are based on it.
